PHRASE.LANG: A must for every TV and film fan, this multi-panelled plasma television creates a high definition, panoramic view to transport you into the scene itself. [#Legal]
Un must pour tout fan de cinéma, ce mur d'écrans plasma vous garantie la meilleure experience Home cinema. [#Legal]
Ein Muss für jeden TV und Filmfan! Dieser Multi-Panel Plasma TV erzeugt ein HD - Panoramabild, dass Sie mitten ins Geschehen transportiert. [#Legal]

Assolutamente da avere per tutti gli appassionati di tecnologia, intrattenimento e TV. L'immagine panoramica animata ad alta risoluzione ti progetta direttamente all'interno della scena stessa. [#Legal]

el objeto obligatorio para todos los amantes de la television y las peliculas, esta television plasma de multiples paneles crea una imagen de alta definicion y panoramica, que te transportara dentro de la escena [#Legal]
A must for every TV and film fan, this multi-panelled plasma television creates a high definition, panoramic view to transport you into the scene itself. [#Legal]
